overview:
Arjun Jayaram is the head of engineering at Become.com overseeing research and development of research, product search, search engine marketing and other machine algorithms for Become.com. Arjun has over fifteen years of software engineering management and architecture experience. Arjun joined Become from BEA Systems where he was the principal architect and was the lead architect for the company’s world wide field operations integration efforts. Prior to BEA, Arjun was a senior development manager at the PeopleTools division of PeopleSoft where he led the development of several products for life cycle management.

Prior to PeopleSoft Arjun has been in management and architect positions at Sybase and Honeywell. Arjun is a speaker at Java conferences and SOA conferences. Arjun received his dual MBA in strategic management and marketing management from California State University East Bay and has a B.Tech in computer science and engineering from Calicut University India.
